entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@chrislhayes @kurteichenwald 2/5 Chuck Schumer in a tweet continues to call Trumps’ travel ban from China “premature.” 2/7 White House’s Coronavirus Task Force gives press briefing.
2/9 White House Coronavirus Task Force meets with all governors regarding virus.
